title: Best of The Program | Guests: Steve Deace & Madison Cawthorn | 11/4/20
description:
The election still can’t be called. President Trump did better than the mainstream media predicted, but was it enough? Oregon decriminalized the possession of small amounts of hard drugs. BlazeTV’s Steve Deace believes we just witnessed a “coup." Congressional winner Madison Cawthorn joins after becoming the first representative-elect born in the 1990s.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
